metadata.title: CVE-2022-3635 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, has been found in LinuxKernel. Affected by this issue is the function tst_timer of the filedrivers/atm/idt77252.c of the component IPsec. The manipulation leads touse after free. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue.VDB-211934 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
